title: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit
customCss: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Anonymous+Pro&family=Major+Mono+Display&display=swap'); h1 { font-family: 'Major Mono Display', monospace; text-transform: capitalize; } p { font-family: 'Anonymous Pro', monospace; } h1, p { color: #F0F8; text-align: center } p > strong { color: #0FF8; font-weight: 400; } p { overflow: hidden; border-right: .15em solid orange; white-space: nowrap; margin: 0 auto; letter-spacing: .15em; animation:  typing 6s steps(40, end), blink-caret .75s step-end infinite; } @keyframes typing { from { width: 0 } to { width: 100% } } @keyframes blink-caret { from, to { border-color: transparent } 50% { border-color: #FF08; } } #app { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #280028, #282800, #002828); animation: gradient 8s infinite; background-size: 400% 400%; } @keyframes gradient { 0% { background-position: 0% 50%; } 50% { background-position: 100% 50%; } 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; } }
